businesses.name: Life Ready Studio
businesses.business_details: Life Ready Studio started based on my passion for moving people to a better quality of life and really supporting people through whatever journey they are going through. I love motivating people to keep strong and hone in on their own bodies. Pilates is such a great form of exercise as it really allows people to focus on themselves, enjoy time to de-stress and work on their own body and mind. I built Life Ready Studio on the basis that I wanted to connect to people and support people through any walk of life!
businesses.product_details: We normally offer an intimate, personalised mat pilates service. Our classes are designed to keep clients toned and strong in a small group environment (maximum 10 people in a class), giving each client that personal touch throughout their classes. We focus on toning the body, creating postural awareness and lengthening the muscles.
businesses.new_products:
- Virtual classes – we are now offering online prerecorded mat pilates classes aimed to keep you fit and strong through COVID–19
- Classes run from 10–30 minutes and include full body, stretch, hips, butts and thighs and pre/post natal classes
- Classes can be done at any place, any time giving people flexibility to workout at their preferred time
businesses.headline: Keeping you strong through this uncertain time! Mat pilates studio providing online classes to keep you toned, lengthened and strengthened from the comfort of your own home.
